name: RadishHead
description:
You are lost. Your big brother was kidnapped. But his katana is in your hands, remember what he taught you. You can save your brother and find the way out from this haunted woods.

At first, find the campfire

Use your katana to cut your way thru the bushes, and effectively and suddenly attack enemies before they even know it

You can find these useful tools on your way:

  • Bomb – will help you make the path thru the rocks or get rid of an enemy safely
  • Smoke-Bomb – let you came closer to one or multiple enemies and make a strike or just safely avoid them
  • Berries – will recover your health
  • Statues – are rare, blow them with a bomb and find something extremely helpful
Notes*
Enemies always notice you when you're on the line with them

These are enemies you'll meet: the annoying spitting Flower, jumping Frog, and be careful with the nervous and fast Boar

This is our humble attempt to participate in #7DRL. Made by cptnsigh and katezillla
